fr.zelus.jarvis.core.session

Class JarvisSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zelus.jarvis.core.session.JarvisSession
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogFlowSession

    public class JarvisSession
extends Object
    A session holding user-related information.

    A JarvisSession is bound to a user, and holds all the volatile information related to the current conversation. A JarvisSession contains a JarvisContext, that represents the contextual variables of the current conversation.

    See Also:
    JarvisContext, JarvisCore.getOrCreateJarvisSession(String)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JarvisSession(String sessionId)
      Constructs a new, empty JarvisSession with the provided sessionId.
      JarvisSession(String sessionId, Configuration configuration)
      Constructs a new, empty JarvisSession with the provided sessionId and configuration.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JarvisContext getJarvisContext()
      Returns the session's JarvisContext holding context-related variables.
      String getSessionId()
      Returns the unique identifier of the JarvisSession.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JarvisSession

        public JarvisSession(String sessionId)
        Constructs a new, empty JarvisSession with the provided sessionId. See JarvisSession(String, Configuration) to construct a JarvisSession with a given Configuration.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the unique identifier of the JarvisSession

      • JarvisSession

        public JarvisSession(String sessionId,
                     Configuration configuration)
        Constructs a new, empty JarvisSession with the provided sessionId and configuration.

        This constructor forwards the provided Configuration to the underlying JarvisContext and can be used to customize JarvisContext properties.

        Parameters:
        sessionId - the unique identifier of the JarvisSession
        configuration - the Configuration parameterizing the JarvisSession
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if the provided sessionId or configuration is null
